backup.title: Back Up Seed Phrase
backup.description: Please write down the Seed phrase in the correct order to ensure a proper backup.
backup.mnemonic: To ensure the security of your mnemonic, please view it in a safe environment. Be careful not to be peeped or photographed by others.
backup.keepSafe: Keep your Seed phrase safe in an offline location.
backup.storeSeed: Do not share or store your Seed phrase in any online environment, such as email, photo albums, or social apps.
backup.wallet: Back up your Seed phrase to keep your wallet safe
backup.walletMsg: You’ll need the Seed phrase to restore your wallet when changing devices or reinstalling the app. To keep your wallet secure, please make sure to back up your Seed phrase as soon as possible.
backup.ownership: Having the Seed phrase means having full ownership of the wallet assets.
backup.securely: Securely Backing Up Your Seed Phrase
backup.use: Use pen and paper to write down your Seed phrase in the correct order.
backup.keepPhrase: Keep the mnemonic phrase in a safe place.
coin.marketMsg: The total market value of a crypto's circulating supply.Market cap = Current price × Circulating.
coin.maxSupplyMsg: The highest amount of crypto that can be in circulation while the crypto is in existence. If the supply of crypto is unlimited or unverified, the maximum supply will be displayed as "Unable to estimate".
coin.circulatingMsg: The amount of crypto that is circulating in the market and in public hands
coin.invalidAddress: Invalid address.Please re-enter and try again
coin.checkTransaction: Check more transaction history on the Blockchain explorer.
coin.placeholder: Enter wallet address or domain name
global.passwordNotMatch: Your password not match the wallet origin password.
global.entryQty: Please enter the quantity of assets to be transferred.
waller.message: Select to create a new wallet or restore an existing wallet
wallet.seedDescription: Enter your Seed phrase or private key to add or restore your wallet. The imported phrase or key will be encrypted and securely stored on your device. For the safety of your assets, please keep your Seed phrase or private key safe and confidential.
wallet.createDescription: Name your multi-account wallet and set a password for protection. You can also add more wallets later.
wallet.name: Wallet Name
wallet.setDescription: Set a name for your wallet. Create a wallet password and ensure it is kept secure.
validate.clipboard: Your browser does not support reading the clipboard.
validate.clipboardMsg: Failed to read the clipboard. Please ensure that permissions have been granted.
validate.repeatPassword: The two passwords do not match.
validate.password: The password length should be at least 8 string characters and no more than 20 characters.
validate.confirmMsg: Please select the checkbox for terms.
network.minMsg: The network fee is lower than the min mode, which may cause the transaction time to be too long or the transaction to fail.
network.maxMsg: The network fee has exceeded max, please set it between min ({min}) and max ({max})
swap.desciption: Please ensure the approved amount is sufficient for your upcoming transactions.
swap.expired: Quote expired. Update to fetch a new quote.
